q1.text: In which area would you like assistance?
options: I need help exploring current (local) environmental action initiatives
I need help designing my own inspiring project

q2.text: Are you looking to design a project from scratch, or model yours after an existing project?

condition.value: I need help designing my own inspiring project

q3.text: Is there a particular project theme you are interested in?

q4.text: Are you looking for projects in a specific country?

q5.text: Are you looking for a project that is currently active, or for example, are you looking for project inspiration irregardless of inactivity?

q6.text: Are you looking for a project which has material available for teaching school children or young adults?

q7.text: Are you looking for a project with open data, allowing you to download the data and analyse them yourself?

q8.text: Are you looking for an phone app to assist with data collection?
